---
title: D H PARTNERSHIP
author: ''
date: '2022-08-30'
slug: d_h_partnership
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $34.1M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with D H PARTNERSHIP. The average
  contract duration was 6.15 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $619.1M.
  The longest contract was 10.01 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $897.0M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '34.1M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '2'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '2'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '100%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '2303%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '4'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '681.4M'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '6.15'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '619.1M'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '10.01'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '897.0M'
---
